verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* brother \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w led|strong="G2424"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w transfigured|strong="G3339"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. \w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w shone|strong="G2989"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*.

\w Suddenly|strong="G2400"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w appeared|strong="G3708"\w* \w before|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3708"\w*, \w talking|strong="G4814"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, “\w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w wish|strong="G2309"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w put|strong="G4160"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w shelters|strong="G4633"\w*—\w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w*.”

\w While|strong="G1722"\w* \w Peter|strong="G2980"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w still|strong="G2089"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w bright|strong="G5460"\w* \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* enveloped \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w My|strong="G3708"\w* beloved \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w*. \w Listen|strong="G2400"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*!”

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* heard \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* facedown \w in|strong="G1909"\w* terror.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* over \w and|strong="G2532"\w* touched \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. “\w Get|strong="G1453"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*,” \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*.”

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w looked|strong="G3708"\w* \w up|strong="G1869"\w*, \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w commanded|strong="G1781"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w anyone|strong="G3367"\w* \w about|strong="G2424"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w vision|strong="G3705"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Man|strong="G3367"\w* \w has|strong="G3739"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.”

\w His|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*?”

\w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w does|strong="G2064"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w first|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* restore \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w has|strong="G3748"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w recognize|strong="G1921"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w whatever|strong="G3745"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w wished|strong="G2309"\w*. \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w same|strong="G3779"\w* \w way|strong="G3779"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Man|strong="G3756"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5259"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w understood|strong="G4920"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w He|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w speaking|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Baptist.

\w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* man \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w up|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knelt|strong="G1120"\w* \w before|strong="G4314"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*.

“\w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*,” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G2962"\w* seizures \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w suffering|strong="G3958"\w* terribly. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w often|strong="G4178"\w* \w falls|strong="G4098"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Your|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heal|strong="G2323"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.”

“\w O|strong="G5599"\w* unbelieving \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perverse|strong="G1294"\w* \w generation|strong="G1074"\w*!” \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w How|strong="G2193"\w* \w long|strong="G2193"\w* \w must|strong="G1510"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w remain|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*? \w How|strong="G2193"\w* \w long|strong="G2193"\w* \w must|strong="G1510"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w put|strong="G2532"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*? \w Bring|strong="G5342"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* boy \w here|strong="G5602"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Me|strong="G1473"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w demon|strong="G1140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w boy|strong="G3816"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w moment|strong="G5610"\w*.

\w Afterward|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w privately|strong="G2398"\w* \w and|strong="G4334"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* couldn’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w drive|strong="G1544"\w* \w it|strong="G5101"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w*?”

“\w Because|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G1223"\w* unbelief,” \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w truly|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w size|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w mustard|strong="G4615"\w* \w seed|strong="G2848"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w*, ‘\w Move|strong="G3327"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w here|strong="G1759"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*,’ \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w move|strong="G3327"\w*. \w Nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* impossible \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.
But this kind does not go out except by prayer and fasting.”

\w While|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* staying \w together|strong="G4962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Man|strong="G1519"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G3195"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G3195"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* kill \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* life.” \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w deeply|strong="G4970"\w* \w grieved|strong="G3076"\w*.

\w After|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w arrived|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* collectors \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w two-drachma|strong="G1323"\w* tax \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Does|strong="G2064"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w Teacher|strong="G1320"\w* \w pay|strong="G5055"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* two drachmas?”

“\w Yes|strong="G3483"\w*,” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*. \w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* preempted \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. “\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w*, \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*?” \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w From|strong="G2064"\w* \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w do|strong="G5101"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w kings|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w collect|strong="G2983"\w* \w customs|strong="G5056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taxes|strong="G2778"\w*: \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* own \w sons|strong="G5207"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w*?”

“\w From|strong="G3588"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w*,” Peter \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w exempt|strong="G1658"\w*,” \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

“\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w offend|strong="G4624"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w cast|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* hook, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w fish|strong="G2486"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* catch. \w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* open \w its|strong="G1325"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* four-drachma coin. \w Take|strong="G2983"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w My|strong="G1325"\w* tax \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yours|strong="G4771"\w*.”
